Come run and hang with the happiest group in NYC. We run, ride bikes, read books, and generally have a good time.

Weekly Evening Run

Join us for a 5k run that starts and finishes at Astoria Park track. We have 3 pace groups and stop halfway to rest and socialize before heading back to the park.

Weekly Track Run

Join us for a 45-minute interval run at the Astoria Park track. After the run, we meet at the corner of the inner field to socialize. (Feel free to join us and run however you want)
